main event: The witness observed three unusual objects near Lone Pine, California on August 29, 1964 around 10:30 PM.
interesting points: The objects appeared to be a jet airplane but their speed and maneuvers were much greater than any known jet aircraft.
The objects moved rapidly in straight lines, made extremely sharp turns, sometimes appeared to stop momentarily, then resumed flight.
The objects were larger than any commercial jet and were completely silent.
The witness and his father, an aeronautical engineer, observed the objects for about 10-15 minutes.
Later that night, the witness observed two more similar objects that came within about 800 yards of the first object.
witnesses: the witness, his father (an aeronautical engineer), and another person
